actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4422.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for each of 3 barges.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for three named barges for employment in the coastwise trade.
